messages:
Name: Milan Skriniar
Nationality: Slovakia
Date of Birth: February 11, 1995
Position: Defender
Current club: Paris Saint-Germain
Ligue 1 clubs played for: Paris Saint-Germain

Milan Skriniar, the Paris Saint-Germain defender, has not played in the majority of the side's Ligue 1 games in 2024/2025, making five appearances overall and accumulating 381 minutes of playing time. He has started in four of these appearances across their 19 fixtures and come on as a substitute on one occasion.
Skriniar last featured in a competition game on November 22, playing 90 minutes for Paris Saint-Germain against Toulouse in a 3-0 victory. He has been shown one yellow card.
Paris Saint-Germain are on the road at Brest on February 1 the next time the side are in Ligue 1 action.
Last season for Paris Saint-Germain, Skriniar made 24 Ligue 1 appearances.
Prior to joining Paris Saint-Germain in July 2023, Skriniar made 193 league appearances in total at Internazionale, scoring 10 goals and providing one assist.
It was on August 12, 2023 that Skriniar made his Ligue 1 debut, at the age of 28 years and 182 days, against Lorient. In his Ligue 1 career overall, he has played 29 times in the competition.
